content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There are internal English courses at EPAM. English classes help employees reach the level of English necessary for free communication and better carrying out project activities.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The courses are designed primarily for production staff, whose English language proficiency is in the range between A0 and B1+. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":3368,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6d3e7540-3a36-460f-afdf-f41991742f0c/en1.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6d3e7540-3a36-460f-afdf-f41991742f0c/en1.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"en1.PNG\",\"name\":\"en1.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"6d3e7540-3a36-460f-afdf-f41991742f0c\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":715,\"height\":76},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Take English Assessment to define your language level that will be displayed in your UPSA profile.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Meet the target audience requirements (production staff А0–В1+).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Monitor the registration for courses (you will receive e-mail notifications). Participation in classes is possible only if there are free places in the group.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"English Classes are very popular. Therefore, all employees (level A0–B1+) who are not enrolled in the course of an appropriate level due to the lack of available places are added to the waiting list. Managers will be notified about that. Managers prioritize the training requests of their team members.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":3984,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4274dc94-5b5f-4517-a35c-d12d3b41c5e3/en2.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4274dc94-5b5f-4517-a35c-d12d3b41c5e3/en2.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"en2.PNG\",\"name\":\"en2.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"4274dc94-5b5f-4517-a35c-d12d3b41c5e3\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":715,\"height\":67},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1. You can apply for English Assessment through \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/start\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"learn.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/workplace/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Telescope\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Within 7 working days after that you will receive an e-mail asking to choose the time and date of the Assessment:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":133113,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a3931160-7852-4285-9f40-dc02f383fdc3/en3.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a3931160-7852-4285-9f40-dc02f383fdc3/en3.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"en3.PNG\",\"name\":\"en3.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"a3931160-7852-4285-9f40-dc02f383fdc3\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":806,\"height\":309},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2. The Assessment consists of two parts: writing and speaking. Both tests can be conducted either online or offline. The results of the assessment will be displayed in your UPSA profile.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"While you are waiting for the course to start, you can study English yourself, using the teachers' \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMLND/Self-Study+Bank\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"recommendations\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any questions, please, address them to the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:AskLearn@epam.com?subject=Language%20Training\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"AskLearn\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" team.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
